name: Are you eligible for an IRE21 fellowship? (IRE_NICAR)
name_original: Are you eligible for an IRE21 fellowship? (IRE_NICAR)
description:
Attend IRE21 (and get a full year of IRE membership) on us! Hosting a virtual conference means we have nearly 200 fellowships to give. 

The deadline for applications is April 19.

Learn more about the conference on our website. See you in June for #IRE21!
